Uses of Interface
org.xmlunit.diff.ComparisonController

  • Packages that use ComparisonController 
    Package Description
    org.custommonkey.xmlunit
    Root of the XMLUnit 1.x compatibility layer.
    org.xmlunit.assertj
    AssertJ assertions on top of XMLUnit's core.
    org.xmlunit.assertj3
    AssertJ 3.x assertions on top of XMLUnit's core.
    org.xmlunit.builder
    Provides fluent builders for core parts of XMLUnit.
    org.xmlunit.diff
    Contains XMLUnit DifferenceEngine that is at the heart of all comparisons as well as supporting interfaces and implementations.
    org.xmlunit.matchers
    Hamcrest matchers on top of XMLUnit's core.

    • Uses of ComparisonController in org.custommonkey.xmlunit

      static class  NewDifferenceEngine.ComparisonController2ComparisonController
      Adapts XMLUnit 1.x ComparisonController to XMLUnit 2.x ComparisonController.

    • Uses of ComparisonController in org.xmlunit.diff

      Fields in org.xmlunit.diff declared as ComparisonController 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static ComparisonController ComparisonControllers.Default
      Does not stop the comparison at all.
      static ComparisonController ComparisonControllers.StopWhenDifferent
      Makes the comparison stop as soon as the first "real" difference is encountered.
      static ComparisonController ComparisonControllers.StopWhenSimilar
      Makes the comparison stop as soon as the first difference is encountered even if it is similar.
      Methods in org.xmlunit.diff that return ComparisonController 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected ComparisonController AbstractDifferenceEngine.getComparisonController()
      Provides access to the configured ComparisonController.
      Methods in org.xmlunit.diff with parameters of type ComparisonController 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AbstractDifferenceEngine.setComparisonController​(ComparisonController c)  
      void DifferenceEngine.setComparisonController​(ComparisonController c)
      Determines whether the comparison should stop after given difference has been found.

    • Uses of ComparisonController in org.xmlunit.matchers

      Methods in org.xmlunit.matchers with parameters of type ComparisonController 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CompareMatcher CompareMatcher.withComparisonController​(ComparisonController comparisonController)
      Throws an exception as you the ComparisonController is completely determined by the factory method used.
